publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4231 Murdo Fraser: Angus Glens Walking Festival—That the Parliament celebrates the seventh Angus Glens Walking Festival, which takes place from 28 until 31 May 2009 and involves over 24 guided walks in the Angus glens as well as evening events; recognises the importance of the festival in encouraging the public to explore and to engage with the stunning scenery, flora and fauna and geological features of the Angus glens; notes that the festival is designed to get people involved with walking and to discover the area, and commends the excellent organisation and the dedication by everyone involved in the festival, which have made it a continued success.

S3M-4231 Murdo Fraser: Angus Glens Walking Festival—That the Parliament celebrates the seventh Angus Glens Walking Festival, which takes place from 28 until 31 May 2009 and involves over 24 guided walks in the Angus glens as well as evening events; recognises the importance of the festival in encouraging the public to explore and to engage with the stunning scenery, flora and fauna and geological features of the Angus glens; notes that the festival is designed to get people involved with walking and to discover the area, and commends the excellent organisation and the dedication by everyone involved in the festival, which have made it a continued success.
